divs: sighting detailsi was fishing about 2 miles from woods hole at trunk river just after dark. there is no moon and the stars are coming out. the first and brightest star is over marthas vineyard. at about 7:45pm, [cms\tg\pd] my eye catches what i first thought was a very bright shooting star with a cone-shaped tail, like a flashlight beam. it was to my right in the sky between the nobska lighthouse and the vineyard. i couldn't tell if what i was looking at was real or just my eyes adjusting in the darkness. hadn't i just been starring at that bright star over the vineyard? the cone started to look like smoke being blow in the dark and grew larger. it grew to the size of a large cloud. at that moment i was relieved as i realized what i'd seen was just a strange cloud. the cloud started to slowly move east. as i reassured myself everything was normal, the cloud quickly broke apart and disolved. very unusual. still not sure if i wasn't the lights playing tricks on my eyes.
Summary: Was somone blowing smoke in the sky?
trends: There has been one other sighting in Falmouth
There were no other sightings in Falmouth on or around September 19th 2009
